snippet: Georgia quarterback Aaron Murray rebounded from a crushing loss and news of his father’s cancer to lead the Bulldogs to the SEC title game against Alabama on Saturday.
abstract: Georgia quarterback Aaron Murray has rebounded from team's crushing loss to South Carolina in October and news of his father’s cancer to lead team to upcoming SEC title game against Alabama.
lead_paragraph: Georgia quarterback Aaron Murray rebounded from a crushing loss and news of his father’s cancer to lead the Bulldogs to the SEC title game against Alabama on Saturday.

headline.seo: After Lowest Point, Georgia’s Aaron Murray Nears Peak
headline.main: After Lowest Point, Murray Nears Peak
headline.print_headline: After Lowest Point, Murray Nears Peak
